title: Koira
description:
Koira invites players to embark on a charming adventure, centered around the blossoming friendship between a human and a playful puppy. Together, you’ll explore a magical forest, where ancient puzzles await to be solved and friendly woodland creatures seek your companionship. The journey is a quest to find your way home, a path paved with discovery and the strengthening bond between you and your new four-legged companion. Along the way, you’ll need to navigate treacherous paths and outsmart lurking hunters, adding a touch of suspense to this otherwise peaceful exploration.
The connection with your puppy is central to the experience. You’ll nurture this relationship by feeding, caring for, and playing with your furry friend, creating a deep and meaningful bond. The forest itself is a diverse and enchanting landscape, featuring shaded groves, snow-covered hills, and mysterious dark caves, each offering unique challenges and visual delights. Stealth and courage will be your allies as you evade relentless hunters, working together to restore the ancient forest and awaken its mysterious monuments. STORROR Parkour Pro
Koira is a celebration of friendship and the power of collaboration. You’ll work in tandem with your puppy to overcome obstacles and solve intricate puzzles, relying on each other’s strengths to succeed. The forest’s inhabitants, a diverse array of animals, will require your assistance, adding layers of heartwarming interactions to your journey. The game’s musical landscape and vibrant visuals create a captivating atmosphere, drawing you into a world of wonder and discovery. With each step, you’ll deepen your bond with your puppy and unravel the secrets of the ancient forest, all while striving to find your way home.

system_requirements.Processor: AMD / Intel CPU (3,3 GHz or higher). Intel Core i3-2120 or newer is recommended
system_requirements.Graphics: Nvidia/AMD dedicated graphics card, with at least 1GB of dedicated VRAM. Nvidia GeForce GTS 450 is recommended.
